alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:50PM CDT until April 01 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY... At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hickory Hills, or near Escatawpa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Vancleave, Hickory Hills and Helena. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 57 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
